title: The Gold rush. - Edited version
creator_credit: Spectra Films, Dennis R. Atkinson and Charles Chaplin
brief_description: An abridged version of Charlie Chaplin’s 1925 silent film classic, with commentary and a music track added. Deals with the hardships of life on the Alaskan frontier. Suitable for film studies students.
